document_data.mainbody:
ord Krell Huntcrown was the head of the noble Huntcrown family of Cormyr in the 14 century DR.
Lord Krell was a short-tempered man, and opposed the acceptance of adventuring companies in Cormyr, and conspired to discredit them. He was a known schemer in high-society.
In the , Lord Krell attended King Azoun Obarskyr IVs birthday feast, hosted by Lord Partic Thistle at Thistleflame Keep. He was accompanied there by Lady Ohrmatha Huntcrown. He used the opportunity to have a spy poke around the Manor and look for an embarrassing scandal that could be used against Lord Thistle, the Registrant General of Cormyr.
